images.description: A minimalist line-art logo depicting a house outline in green. The house has a pitched roof, chimney, two square windows, and a doorway. The company name 'VŠE PRO STAVBY.CZ' is implied by the context. Context: Serves as the primary logo for the website, likely appearing in the header. Clear and simple design, scalable as a vector graphic.

An exterior view of a renovated cottage near Tanvald. The house has a white lower facade and dark brown upper facade and roof, surrounded by green grass and a forested hill in the background. A person stands near the house on the right. Context: Featured as 'OMLAZENÍ CHALUPY U TANVALDU' in the 'NAŠE POSLEDNÍ PROJEKTY' section and 'OPRAVA FASÁDY - TANVALD' in 'REFERENCE'. Shows the completed façade work clearly, good overall lighting, though resolution could be higher.

An exterior view of a fully renovated family house. The house has a light-colored facade, a dark grey tiled roof, and dark-framed windows. Cars are parked on the street in front, and a modern fence is visible. The sky is partly cloudy. Context: Represents a 'KOMPLETNÍ REKONTRUKCE RODINNÉHO DOMU' project on the homepage and 'CELKOVÁ REKONTRUKCE RODINNÉHO DOMU - PRAHA' in 'REFERENCE'. Good representation of a completed project, with decent lighting and composition.
